Cinder is a countertop grill with the precision of sous-vide and the power of a stovetop. With grill plates that stay within 1 degree of your food's ideal temperature, Cinder provides edge-to-edge cooking with no temperature fluctuations — and it brings this precision to high-temperature searing too!
Order your Cinder through this campaign to get a discounted price and avoid waiting an extra 6-8 months before it hits stores.
You are already accustomed to making consistently incredible meals with sous vide.

But sous vide prep and clean-up take too much time (e.g. water baths, vacuum sealing, plastic bags, firing up the stove afterward). Cinder’s here to make sous vide faster, more versatile, and easier to use.

The results have professional chefs and sous vide aficionados alike calling Cinder revolutionary. Chef Kenji made the world’s best grilled cheese on Cinder. And Serious Eats declared it ""excellent.""
Place any fresh or frozen food inside Cinder and it will cook to Michelin-starred perfection.

Dial in a temperature or pair Cinder with the mobile app (Android version coming soon). The app automatically reads the thickness of your food (from Cinder) and tells you how long it'll take to cook. Cool, right?

No need for checking in or constant flipping. The temperature inside Cinder is so tightly controlled that you could leave it sitting inside Cinder for an additional 2 hours and your food still wouldn't overcook.
This is truly set-it-and-forget-it. If you don't regularly have the time to cook — or cook well — Cinder is the last kitchen appliance you'll ever need.
Cinder's ceramic plates don't require butter or oil, so you just put the food in and close the lid. That's it.
Whether it's a beep from the grill or a notification from the optional Cinder app, you'll be told when your food is done cooking — without you having to check.

Next, you can either let it sit at the target temperature and carry on with your other tasks. Or, you can switch Cinder into searing mode. In 45 seconds, you'll have a restaurant-quality sear with a deliciously caramelized exterior.

When you're done eating, wipe down the grill plates with a paper towel. There are no pans or pots to clean up, no grills to scrub, no utensils to clean — nothing. (When your food doesn't burn, there’s no sticky mess to clean up.)
So not only is Cinder set-it-and-forget-it, it's also zero hassle. Perfect for people short on time.
Cinder is the world’s first hyper-precision grill, and there's nothing like it on the market.

Precise temperature — not cooking time — is everything when it comes to cooking great food. Other appliances simply don’t have uniform temperatures across their surface. Steak dries out, salmon cooks unevenly, and you're left with food that’s mediocre unless you stressfully nail timing within 15-30s.

Cinder gets around this by using tiny heating nodes that continuously turn on and off to ensure every millimeter (literally) is at the correct temperature. This precision changes home cooking — no more monitoring and adjusting temperature every few minutes. Instead, work on your side dishes and talk with your family.
This is sous-vide cooking with the convenience of a microwave.
We’ve met so many customers with incredible stories about how Cinder has changed their lives:
<ul>
<li>

GET YOUR FREE-TIME BACK: 
“When I come home from work I’m exhausted. I used to just buying prepared food, but I make a meal with Cinder now then actually spend time with my family while it’s cooking. We were playing Monopoly one day and I accidentally forgot to take some salmon out… for almost an hour or so. It still came out perfect.” — Anne-Marie, Dover
<li>

MAKE EVERYONE IN YOUR FAMILY A CHEF:
“My husband got me a Cinder for my birthday and I was furious because I thought he bought it for himself as another space-wasting gadget! I didn’t use it for several weeks, but one day my 12 year old made some chicken and toasted bread in it for his teammates. I couldn’t believe how good it tasted. After that I was hooked. He made chef-quality food himself.” — Deb, Austin
<li>

MAKE BLAND FOOD TASTE GREAT:
“I’m a professional body builder and spend quite a bit of time in the gym or doing personal training on the side. I used to put chicken breasts and steak into the oven in bulk, and they would come out dry and overdone. A friend loaned me his Cinder and it’s just brilliant. I throw the frozen breasts onto Cinder just like I did before, but now it tastes incredible and juicy. Never thought my barbaric cooking could taste so freaking good.” — Riz, New Jersey
<li>

FOCUS ON THE REST OF YOUR MEAL:
 “My friends and I started a little underground restaurant of sort in San Francisco last year. We hold dinners at our house, but have a tiny kitchen and run out of pots and pans even when we’re cooking for our weekly guests. We use the Cinder to put all the protein on autopilot then focus on the creative side dishes and garnish stuff.” — James and Chelsea, San Francisco
<li>

REMOVE THE HASSLE OF SOUS-VIDE:
 “My wife’s dad is a chef. A couple years back I bought a sous vide precision cooker to impress him with filet mignon. I didn’t realize you had to take the meat out and sear it after it was done cooking. The meat came out a grey color and so I stopped cooking for a while after that. Didn’t have the motivation to make a smoky mess of my kitchen. A few months ago I saw a Cinder at the Target Open House and knew this was exactly what I was looking for the first time I bought a sous-vide device. I’ve been cooking delicious scallops and zucchini and am excited to impress my father-in-law this weekend.” — Chris, Medford
<div><div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe src=""https://www.youtube.com/embed/3AvVwlIE70Y?autohide=1&amp
<h3 style=""text-align: center
MISSION:

Our goal is to provide greater accessibility to high-end cooking, allowing you to get the consistency and quality of professional meals without guesswork or mess. We want at-home-chefs to reclaim the time they should be spending friends and family. Cooking should be enjoyable, creative, and sociable — not stressful and isolating.
<div><div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe src=""https://www.youtube.com/embed/uPnqCkKef0w?autohide=1&amp
CERTIFICATIONS
Cinder is certified by Arrow Electronics. Cinder is also a member of Target's Open House Garage product line.
NEXT STEPS
Every day, we think about how we can make Cinder better. Looking forward, we want to improve the following:
<ul>
• Better control of pressure applied to the food.
• More extensive recipe library for the app.
• Make the mobile software available on Android.
HIGHLIGHTS
• We only ship to the USA and Canada. Sign up for our mailing list on our website to be alerted when we ship internationally.
<li>We will ship units in about six months from campaign end. Delays are unlikely
column2: we've already manufactured and delivered over a thousand Cinders.

column1: • Ordering during our 30 day campaign is the only way to get a discount on Cinder and be placed at the top of the shipping queue. Otherwise, you'll be waiting several additional months to get your Cinder.
We've already shipped!
We started with a dream
Early testing proving precision temperature cooking was possible.
We built, tested, iterated
Cinder evolution from concept to product (left to right).
Getting feedback at the Modernist Cuisine test kitchen, Seattle.
We gained confidence in our cooking.
First time cooking duck, Cinder test kitchen.
Wait, I can cook duck??
We worked with amazing partners
Cooking for Y Combinator demo day, Mountain View.
Reviewing paperwork with the factory owner, China,
We started production.
Cinder production line, China.
We shipped units
Packing the first container, China.
We Delivered units
Hand delivery to early supporter, San Francisco.
Eric's car, SF Bay Area.
Early delivery, Palo Alto.
And changed lives
Cooking dinner for friends, with more confidence and less stress, Eric's apartment.
And we welcome you to join us, and cook in the future.
<div>
<div><div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe src=""https://www.youtube.com/embed/uJlYLRw8W8g?autohide=1&amp
Now, testing by robot. Future, cooking by robot.

He made chef-quality food himself.” — Deb, Austin

MAKE BLAND FOOD TASTE GREAT:“I’m a professional body builder and spend quite a bit of time in the gym or doing personal training on the side. I used to put chicken breasts and steak into the oven in bulk, and they would come out dry and overdone. A friend loaned me his Cinder and it’s just brilliant. I throw the frozen breasts onto Cinder just like I did before, but now it tastes incredible and juicy. Never thought my barbaric cooking could taste so freaking good.” — Riz, New Jersey

FOCUS ON THE REST OF YOUR MEAL: “My friends and I started a little underground restaurant of sort in San Francisco last year. We hold dinners at our house, but have a tiny kitchen and run out of pots and pans even when we’re cooking for our weekly guests. We use the Cinder to put all the protein on autopilot then focus on the creative side dishes and garnish stuff.” — James and Chelsea, San Francisco

REMOVE THE HASSLE OF SOUS-VIDE: “My wife’s dad is a chef. A couple years back I bought a sous vide precision cooker to impress him with filet mignon. I didn’t realize you had to take the meat out and sear it after it was done cooking. The meat came out a grey color and so I stopped cooking for a while after that. Didn’t have the motivation to make a smoky mess of my kitchen. A few months ago I saw a Cinder at the Target Open House and knew this was exactly what I was looking for the first time I bought a sous-vide device. I’ve been cooking delicious scallops and zucchini and am excited to impress my father-in-law this weekend.” — Chris, Medford
Got a story? Email us: hello@cindercooks.com.
MISSION:

Our goal is to provide greater accessibility to high-end cooking, allowing you to get the consistency and quality of professional meals without guesswork or mess. We want at-home-chefs to reclaim the time they should be spending friends and family. Cooking should be enjoyable, creative, and sociable — not stressful and isolating.
CERTIFICATIONS
Cinder is certified by Arrow Electronics. Cinder is also a member of Target's Open House Garage product line.
NEXT STEPS
Every day, we think about how we can make Cinder better. Looking forward, we want to improve the following:
Better control of pressure applied to the food.
More extensive recipe library for the app.
Make the mobile software available on Android.
HIGHLIGHTS
We only ship to the USA and Canada. Sign up for our mailing list on our website to be alerted when we ship internationally.
We will ship units in about six months from campaign end. Delays are unlikely
column2: we've already manufactured and delivered over a thousand Cinders.

Who we are....

We create and self-distribute seasonal kegged cocktails and sangrias around Ohio where quality, quick-service and volume are valued. ​ We've created a local brand and niche in the alcohol industry that we believe can grow to a national brand!! Our drinks can be found in Cleveland, Columbus, Toledo, Dayton and their surrounding suburbs.
What do we value?
Most importantly, we value exceptional taste. Additionally, pre-batched cocktails also have some significant advantages: they ensure consistency
column3: and fast serving. Kegged cocktails also reduce a bar's waste by eliminating heavy pours (industry average is 20% loss to over pours). During the busiest times, they also reduce strain on bartenders. Our kegged cocktails work on commercial beer draft systems, meaning there is no additional equipment required.

column1: ​Where we're going?
With the success of our cocktails and sangrias on draft (on-premise), we've embarked on canning our drinks and the response has been overwhelmingly positive.
Our campaign....

It’s been amazing to see an idea become reality, and now having proven our business model, we are looking to take the next step. We want to grow outside of our current sales area, so we need to increase our sales force, build brand awareness through improved marketing campaigns, expand our distribution and continue building through casino partnerships.

We know we could achieve this organically through operating cash flow, but it will take time, and we are impatient to see progress this coming year, so any contribution would be greatly appreciated - and also make you a part of our story and success!
Funding Breakdown
Here's where your donation will be used towards:
- $2.500 Marketing/Sales Campaign
- $5,000 On/Off-premise inventory (kegs/cans,supplies)
- $2,500 Equipment
- $5,000 Sales Staffing
The Perks
Here's what your donation will get you:
○ $10 - Social Media Shout-out!
○ $25 - 20oz Duck Island Cocktails Drink Tumbler
○ $40 - Women's Duck Island Cocktails T-shirt
○ $40 - Men's Duck Island Cocktails T-shirt
○ $60 - T-shirt and Tumbler
○ $100 - T-shirt/Hat/Tumbler/Social Media Shout-Out
○ $500 - Custom Duck Island Cocktails Barrel Head sign
○ $1000 - 128oz Duck Island Cocktails mini-keg (sorry....alcohol not included via crowdfunding)
My background...
Hi, my name is Jim Waltz, and when I was growing up, like a lot of people I wanted to be an entrepreneur, although, I never really knew what business I wanted to get into.

After earning a BA in Business from Kent State University, in Ohio I began the corporate grind and quickly realized that it was not for me. So, back in 2009, with an understanding wife and a 1-yr old, we left Ohio and moved to North Carolina where I went back to school and earned an A.S. in Viticulture/Enology and we began life in the alcohol industry.

Once you understand fermentation, it leads you down a rabbit hole to learn how to make other alcohols. My curiosity eventually lead me to become both a Head Brewer and Head Distiller. In 2015 I was recruited by the owners of the Southern Tier Brewery in Lakewood, NY as the Head Distiller to help them launch the Southern Tier Distilling Company.

Although I thoroughly enjoyed my time at Southern Tier, the itch to start my own business kept coming back. It seemed obvious that the business would be in the alcohol production industry, but I didn’t just want to be another craft brewer or local distillery.
So in 2019 we launched Duck Island Cocktails!!!
The Impact
With our proven business model and products, we will make an impact in the beverage industry. Our goal is to make some noise and standout in a very profitable industry.
<h3>Risks &amp

As with any business venture, risks are always there. However, over the past year, our products have been well received and we’ve forged trust and credibility in our markets. This helps to minimize your risk, so now we can forge ahead with the challenge of growing with a smart/calculated approach together.
Other Ways You Can Help
If you are unable to contribute but like our story, you can help us get the word out!! Please share via word-of-mouth or on your social media platform. Instagram @duck.island.cocktails

0,"<div class=""routerContentStory-storyBody"" data-v-1df7bf5a=""""><div>

Do you remember trying a toaster pastry for the first time? A pastry with sweet frosting and an even sweeter filling that left you feeling like the happiest kid ever. Yet it was exactly that...full of sugar! As you grew older, you left those toaster pastries behind. They lacked positive nutrition and made you feel guilty after eating them.

We've stepped it up a notch and changed the meaning of breakfast. We have taken the guilt out of the guilty pleasure. We created a toaster pastry that your mom to this day would approve of! You want it and you can have it! Adulting has never tasted so good...
Introducing our PRO Toasty! A higher protein, hand-crafted toaster pastry with all the goodness of the classics.
What better way to fuel up your day than with a quality protein toaster pastry that takes you back to your childhood! Who says only kids have fun with their food? We create breakfast &
column2: snacks that are both delicious AND healthy. Win-win! We source the best ingredients, and we wear our heart on our sleeve.

column1: We're EARNEST, transparent, and you know you'll be getting the best out of every bite! We really love our food especially the PRO toasty!
What's not to love about the 3 flavors: Super Strawberry, Charged Chocolate, and Mighty Maple. Indulgent, decadent..it's a dessert and healthy food in one :).
The Crave-Worthy Flavors
We would love your help!

Like any food creation, there are many steps to get to the finish line. We are asking for your contribution to help us pay for production, purchasing the best ingredients for you all, and paying our bakery staff that have been wonderful through this whole process!
For supporting us early in the game, there are sweet discounts for you all! Check out our perks for 10-30% off. Our Indiegogo supporters receive their PROtoastys first!

Not only have we received FABI and NEXTY awards in the past that give us confidence in our newest food creation, we have received a lot of excitement from the press as we have upgraded the traditional toaster pastry and elevated it for adults!
Our Secret Sauce...Almond Butter!

You must be thinking we are crazy for adding almond butter because it's an expensive ingredient. We simply want the best for you all. We bake it into the PROToasty to make it a powerhouse breakfast that satisfies!  It adds plant-based protein and healthy fats to your diet. There's more protein than 1 egg! We use real ingredients and the almond butter is in the dough for a softer crust. A much better option than the dry, taste-less crust of other toaster pastries!
Good Food for the Soul

""Put good in, get good out"" is our motto. Healthy food is one thing, but food that makes you feel good hits your soul. Our higher quality ingredients are good for your body, the nutrition highlights are good for your mind, and the yummy decadence is good for your soul. Substantial, and nutrient dense...our toaster pastry is a high protein treat without the empty calories.
Unlike the other guys, our toastys are hand-made with love! Artisan, small batch, with extra attention to every single one :).
Toasty Prep

Hot out of the toaster or right out of the pouch! There's no wrong way to prep and eat the toasty. For an ooey, gooey filling, we recommend popping it in the toaster for a POP of flavor! If you're on-the-go, rip open the pouch and take a big bite!
And have you seen that icing?! It adds extra yumminess!
<h3>Risks &amp

We have been formulating this toaster pastry for about 2 years now, and it's time to show the world what they're missing! Funny enough, toaster pastries are a bit like like rocket science and we have upgraded all aspects. Whole wheat flour, almond butter and collagen protein in the dough, hand-laid icing...every toasty is different and that's what makes it special! We've had some challenges finding a bakery that is up to our standards, and we finally found one. Let's fill everyone's bellies with our next level toaster pastry!
Our Earnest Story

Earnest Eats was founded by Andrew Aussie, CEO and traveling foodie, after he realized there was a gap between breakfast and snacks being yummy and healthy. He has come across many people including friends, family and our team who have worked together to turn this kitchen staple into a reality. Our team currently resides in sunny San Diego, and we love to eat...everything. We are professional goofballs who love to take advantage of the outdoors. Hiking, running, swimming...you name it. We like to stay active so we can eat all the Earnest Eats goodies we want :).

Introducing WineBlock

Everyone knows someone, if not yourself, who gets a wine-stained smile when they drink red wine. ""Wine mouth,"" as its commonly called. It's embarrassing and after researching solutions, we were frustrated to find there were no convenient or preventative solutions for that dreaded purple hue that appears on your smile after one or two glasses. There are over 1.38 Million Americans and 3.48 Billion people around the globe that drink wine, so we knew we weren't alone in this problem.

We spent two years developing WineBlock and enlisted the help  of a ""Green Chemist"" to ensure WineBlock was made with all-natural, safe, plant-based ingredients. After a small but very successful campaign in the Pacific Northwest, we're looking to take WineBlock to the next level and spread the word nationally and then GLOBALLY. Think #worlddom! But, we need your help.
What We Need &
<ul>
• We need to raise $7.5K or more which we will use towards our marketing/ PR spend and the deposits for our next round of inventory.
• We have put together four ""cheers worthy"" pledge packages that include WineBlock (of course) and other awesome wine accessories from our friends in the wine accessory biz.
• These fun wine accessory packages make the perfect gifts for your favorite wine-loving friend or family member.

• Our $69 pledge package gets you a whole lot of fun wine gear PLUS a chance to win an all-expense paid trip to Napa Valley and wine tasting tour for two! Each $69 pledge gives you an additional chance to win.
The Impact

We love WineBlock because it's a simple solution to a common problem. We're in the business of making wine drinking even more enjoyable and we can't wait to take our company to the next level. We've had agreat response in our hometown of Seattle and the Pacific Northwest regiona including, 3 TV appearances on local Seattle affiliates for ABC, NBC and FOX networks. One customer that gave WineBlock a 5-star review said

""So my teeth always stain when I drink red wine and it's pretty embarrassing. Have just been living with it all these years until now. Read about this product in one of my magazines and thought I would give it a try and I'm so happy I did. Just used it for an all-day wine tour and came out of that with white teeth. Hooray! The texture is nice and there isn't any flavor to interfere with your wine. The fact that it doubles as a lip balm is a bonus.""

What's next after WineBlock you ask? Coffee! We're starting development for our next product CoffeeBlock that will prevent the yellow hue you get on your teeth from your favorite cup of Joe. CoffeeBlock will be available in 2019.
Risks &

Making an investment in inventory is tough for a small company. Manufactures make minimum orders high and ask for money up front. Spreading the word nationally and then globally requires a bigger spend than we currently have. We are looking to the wine-loving community to help us raise part of the funds to expand our reach.
Other Ways You Can Help
We know some people can't contribute by purchasing a package, but that doesn't mean you can't help our mission to end red wine stained lips and teeth!
<ul>
• Make some noise about our campaign by sharing it with all your favorite winos.
• Use the Indiegogo share tools to share on social media.
Thanks for checking out our campaign and cheers!
The Gals at WineBlock

<div style=""text-align: center

We want to make a difference in tea - and do it with a Nordic twist. Our craft teas are a representation of our Finnish heritage. They are plain and straight out natural, as we blend outstanding pure loose leaf teas with forest goodies from the North. Have you ever wondered why tea blends are filled with aromas and additives? We did, and wanted to change that. That is why our blends are crafted using only actual berries and herbs. There are no hidden ingredients or artificially enhanced flavors. When you brew a cup you can be sure it's all natural!
Why we are bringing NORD-T to Indiegogo?

A real tough challenger to the big corporate brands, NORD-T has been growing so quickly that it makes our hearts jump with excitement! The revolution is catching on and NORD-T is now found in more shops, tea houses and homes than ever before. We are taking our products to Indigogo so that we can reach more of you and enabling NORD-T to grow.
<ul>

• Ensure we get enough berries and herbs harvested during our short but oh-so-bright Finnish summer! For that we need more hands on deck and capital to purchase the ingredients from the lovely Finish farmers and producers.

• Improve our package to be better, even prettier and easier to use. If we go over the target goal we will also make the first steps towards expanding our production and packing our beloved teas in neat little bags for better convenience on the go or at home.
• Level up our production in tiny countryside town of Kihniö, Finland
• Expand to more countries in Europe and beyond so you can find us in your favorite store near you soon.
We believe making a change in tea markets from industrial flavored tea blends to real craft teas. So be part of making a difference and get onboard!
What makes NORD-T special?
It's the fact all of our ingredients are grown by the most skillful farmer of them all- Mother Nature.
What awesomeness have we prepared for you?
We've bundled up neat packages to choose from as you back us up. Some of the coolest are limited editions, so make sure to get them before no one else does.
<h3 style=""text-align: center

Our friendship goes all the way to being little kiddies living in same neighborhood and going to Sunday School together. But we grew up, travelling separately to far-flung countries and drinking many a brew. It was not until a common friend invited us to a breakfast in Helsinki - and Mirka got served a cup of tea not worth paying for - when we started to talk about changing the tea culture in restaurants and cafeterias. We wanted to ignite love for tea in the same places that had well-trained baristas pouring cappuccinos, espressos and creating wonderful foam arts to their customers.

One thing lead to another, and when we dug deeper to tea, we noticed most tea blends offered on the market were filled with industrial flavorings, artificial aromas and additives. We knew we had to do something, so we started making our own blends. NORD-T, Nordic tea, was born from our love to the forests and fields of northern lands. We started to make tea blends where absolu-tea-ly all ingredients come from the most skillful farmer of them all- Mother Nature.
This is what's it all about - the teas
We have now 11 teas to be proud of and with help of you, tea lover, we're setting up the business to blend some more. So let's meet our current darlings!
All of our craft teas are done with real chunks of freeze-dried Finland grown berries.

Nordic countries are well know for their pristine forests, clean air and pure water. That is the setting where our berries and herbs grown in. So some of them are grown in wild nature, some in small farms.
<div style=""text-align: center
Our certified organic ingredients: all of our tea leaves are organic
Wild-grown ingredients: birch leaf, heather, lingonberry, nettle
From small farms and suppliers: blackcurrant, strawberry, red clover, rhubarb, sea buckthorn
Share the love!
If you can't financially contribute, we completely understand. You can still be an important part of the campaign! Any help matters, so help us make some noise! Here's exactly what you can do:
<ul>
• share the campaign over social media (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, whatever works for you!)
• send an email with a link to your friends who you think will love NORD-T
• connect us with people you think might be able to help by emailing hello@nord-t.com
• follow us on social media and sign up for our emails

And that's all there is to it. We are super duper excited to have you with us. Thank you!

We are also sharing more of us in social media:
Instagram
Pinterest

Or read more on our website.

xoxo, 

Mirka and Nina

","We want to make a difference in tea - and do it with a Nordic twist. Our craft teas are a representation of our Finnish heritage. They are plain and straight out natural, as we blend outstanding pure loose leaf teas with forest goodies from the North. Have you ever wondered why tea blends are filled with aromas and additives? We did, and wanted to change that. That is why our blends are crafted using only actual berries and herbs. There are no hidden ingredients or artificially enhanced flavors. When you brew a cup you can be sure it's all natural!

The revolution is catching on and NORD-T is now found in more shops, tea houses and homes than ever before. If you've enjoyed some of the many culinary innovations lately, you may be aware of a rare treat known as ‘the golden egg’. Most people have never tasted the exquisite flavor of an In-shell Scrambled Egg.
<div data-id=""14958824""><figure style=""margin: 0px
<div data-id=""15192391""><figure style=""margin: 0px

column1: <div data-id=""15046709""><figure style=""margin: 0px

It works by quickly rotating an egg back and forth. This mixes the egg white and yolk inside the eggshell without introducing outside air. The flavor profile is fresh and delicious and it eliminates the need of hand whipping and messy clean up.
The Orbi is easy to use and absolutely hands-free. Place the egg in Orbi, lock it and in 20 seconds you have a perfectly scrambled egg.
<div data-id=""15044735""><figure style=""margin: 0px
<div data-id=""15044739""><figure style=""margin: 0px

'Golden Eggs' can be enjoyed hard or soft boiled, deviled or in egg salad, fried, pickled, atop noodles, or as a surprise on Easter Sunday. There are many preparations yet to be discovered, perhaps you will be the first to invent a new recipe? Golden eggs are known to be a delicacy but you'll have trouble finding a restaurant serving them and there are no appliances designed to create Golden Eggs... until now.

Risks and challenges

For production, we will be working with a manufacturer with whom we have been working for years. With their expertise, knowledge and technical experience we are confident that we will be able to deliver quality products even if the demand is tremendous.

For fulfillment, there may be unanticipated challenges along the way that could cause potential delays. Should there be any unexpected issues, we promise to address them promptly and keep you updated on our progress.
","Orbi is a hands-free kitchen gadget for making perfect golden eggs. It has been meticulously designed and tested to smoothly scramble the contents of an egg in the shell.

If you've enjoyed some of the many culinary innovations lately, you may be aware of a rare treat known as ‘the golden egg’. Most people have never tasted the exquisite flavor of an In-shell Scrambled Egg.
Become a backer of this project and pick a reward. You will essentially be pre-ordering orbi. You'll get a special backer discount, and you'll receive your stuff before it is available in stores.

It works by quickly rotating an egg back and forth. This mixes the egg white and yolk inside the eggshell without introducing outside air. The flavor profile is fresh and delicious and it eliminates the need of hand whipping and messy clean up.
The Orbi is easy to use and absolutely hands-free. Place the egg in Orbi, lock it and in 20 seconds you have a perfectly scrambled egg.

'Golden Eggs' can be enjoyed hard or soft boiled, deviled or in egg salad, fried, pickled, atop noodles, or as a surprise on Easter Sunday. TWO MAMMAS’ VEGAN
KITCHEN: A Project of Love
Two Mammas' Vegan Kitchen is a work of love and a
collaborative project that brings healthy, ethical and locally sourced, organic
ingredients to our customers. The cooking showcases the beauty, nutrition and
creativity that seasonal produce offers. Often, the ingredients used are either
grown by the business owners themselves or are picked from other Bay Area
farms. From Two Mammas’ Vegan Kitchen, love is imparted through the ethics of
simplicity and non-violence, through the fun we have together while growing and
harvesting food that feeds our community, and through the artistry infused into
each bite. We strive to combine the delightful, decadent tastes our customers
love from wholesome, nutritious ingredients.
Two Mammas’ Vegan Kitchen is a collaboration of Jules and
Jess Piovarcsik- Diliberto, a happily married, queer, vegan couple. We met in meditation
and fell in love a year later baking vegan apple pies for our meditation
center’s fundraiser. We’ve been successfully creating healthy, creative and
delicious food together for three years.
As a business, Two Mammas’ was birthed during the economic
downturn of 2011. We were both unemployed, deeply in love, and constantly in
search of affordable organic produce. We volunteered at urban farms in exchange
for healthy ingredients, saved seeds to grow our own food, and scouted out
nearby food banks, only to be disappointed and outraged by the lack of fresh
food offered to poor people in our East Oakland neighborhood. When the Cottage
Foods bill passed in January 2012, allowing us to apply for a health permit for
our home kitchen, we launched Two Mammas’. Two Mammas’ has been offering
Cottage Foods baked goods and personal chef services for over a year, and more
recently we have started offering catering services. Now we are ready to move
to a café space in East Oakland that is kid-friendly, near public
transportation, and that provides healthy, delicious, affordable food options
this side of Lake Merritt. This campaign is a community initiative to raise
funds for the build-out of our new vegan café space in East Oakland.
Hear more about our story and the connections between food,
economy and community by listening to the following Food Craftsman podcast
interviewing Jules and Jess at: http://foodcraftsmen.com/two-mamas-vegan-kitchen-how-they-started-from-scratch/
Learn more about the CA Homemade Food Act and how it has
helped launch small, artisan food manufacturers and businesses such as Two
Mammas’ Vegan Kitchen in this Edible East Bay article at: http://edibleeastbay.com/online-magazine/fall-harvest-2013/the-california-homemade-food-act/
WHY EAT SEASONAL, LOCAL, NON-GMO and VEGAN?
Two Mammas’ Vegan
Kitchen uses mostly organic, non-GMO, seasonal ingredients that are typically
grown within 200 miles of our location in East Oakland. Jules and Jess handpick
most seasonal ingredients from small Bay Area farms. Artichokes come from
Pescadero. Walnuts come from Modesto. Berries and tomatoes are grown in Oakland
and Brentwood. As a couple, we handpick ingredients together at the peak of
ripeness. We love gardening, harvesting, and feeding people plant-based foods
that are healthy for people and the planet. Cooking delicious, creative,
healthy food is how we as a couple express our love for each other and our
world.
There are several benefits associated with local, seasonal
food. Customers are directly supporting local agriculture and micro-economies.
Local produce is also more environmentally friendly and sustainable, thereby
minimizing our customers’ carbon footprints. Further, it should be noted that
harvesting, eating and preserving peak-season, organic produce locks in vital
nutrients that are commonly lost in commercial agriculture. Finally, eating the
freshest food possible locks in the tastes, textures and subtle flavors
intrinsic within delicious cuisine.
Everything at Two Mammas’ is made from vegan love. Vegan
food is cruelty-free and doesn’t involve the use of other species for meat,
milk or eggs. In terms of the steadily increasing trend of vegetarianism in the
American population, cruelty-free dining is an important, distinct benefit of our
cuisine. Vegan food is also very healthy. Plant-based diets don’t require as
much energy to digest and assimilate nutrients in comparison to meat-based
diets. (Braizer 2007) There are less allergens and no antibiotics in eating
plants. (Bernard 2003) For the semi-vegetarian, vegetarian and vegan segments
of U.S.
society, vegan food represents lower incidents of heart disease, lower
cholesterol levels, less diabetes and increased longevity. (Bernard 2003) Vegan
food is also more environmentally-friendly than meat-based foods. It is lower
in waste and does not contribute to global warming. Rainforests throughout South America are being cut down at alarming rates to
make room for cattle grazing and ranching. (Mgbeoji 2006, Rifkin 1993) A
commonly cited statistic is that farmers can feed ten vegetarians on the same land
it takes to feed one meat eater (Vegetarian Research Group, Rifkin 1993).
Further, global warming-induced draughts, privatization of water, and waste
from industrial animal agriculture in the form of runoff, irrigation and
drinking, is causing a global-thirst, and war, for the 3% of available drinking
water in the world. (Shiva 2002) For Two Mammas’ and the communities we serve,
the environmental impacts of a plant-based diet carry a sense of urgency and
responsibility.
THE NEW CAFÉ BUILD OUT
We have a few
addresses in mind for our Oakland-grown café. But we realize that there is a
lot more to opening a café than having keys and an address. The spaces we have
been looking at are awesome in terms of their community-dining potential, but
none of them have been food making or food gathering spaces in the past. This
means we need architectural plans to show the health department, plumbing,
electrical outlets, counters, tables, and a big refrigerator for all our winter
greens and summer berries. This is why the indiegogo campaign is so important!
While financial
support is super important to making the café build out happen, there are other
ways to help the build out happen. Passing along this fundraising campaign link
is super helpful because it helps our networks and communities grow. If you
have any used commercial equipment, we might be able to use it. Also, if you
have any carpentry, plumbing, electrical or general construction skills to

offer, let us know. We can feed you in exchange for these services.

My name is Stew Corey and I have owned Mexicali since May of 2016. Before that I was a manager at The Windjammer for 6 years. My experience in restaurants goes back to when I was a dishwasher at the Birdseye Diner in Castleton, Vermont when I was 16, almost 20 years ago. It was while I was working at The Windjammer that I meet the Charboneaus and fell in love with Mexicali. From the first time I walked through the doors I knew it was a special place. I could tell by the smiles on the faces of the guests and the staff that it was great place and I instantly wanted to take part. My family and I made the decision to purchase Mexicali and on May 4th, 2016 I took ownership, the day before Cinco de Mayo! Since then I have only fell more in love with Mexicali and the people of the community. I have made mistakes and learned a lot over the course of the last year and unfortunately my last mistake lead to a very severe lesson, one that I will never forget. I am humbly asking our community and friends to help me keep this tradition alive not for my family, but for the charity work that is still to be done, the good food still to serve, the shorties still to be drunk and the hot ranch still to dip. Please help me to prove that sometimes the little guy does win!
Your donations will be used for two phases of the plan to move forward: Phase 1 is to wrap up Mexicali 2.0 and Phase 2 is seed capital for Mexicali 3.0.
Phase 1 will be to close out all the accounts payable that are left including, but not limited to the following:
-paying off outstanding balances to vendors
-paying the balance of the utility bills
-paying the outstanding taxes
-paying off creditors
-paying the legal fees incurred during the eviction process

I won’t know the the exact amount that Phase 1 will cost until I receive a bill for the legal fees and any other fees my previous landlord is going to charge me, but my best estimate is $75,000-$100,000. Hopefully it will be less, but time will tell.
Phase 2 is the exciting part! During Phase 2 your donations will fund the following:
-putting a down payment on a new space
-buying refurbished equipment to kit out the new kitchen
-new signage, computer system, office supplies and other small items
-stocking the kitchen and the bar with all of your favorites
-getting new licenses and insurance
-renovations as needed to the new space
-any other costs of restarting Mexicali
Phase 2 is going to be funded by your donations and an investment of my own and my family’s funds. You might be asking why I have to buy equipment and a computer system
column2: that is because they were sold to cover a part of the money owed to a creditor. So the balance of the donations will go towards this phase of the plan, between $150,000-$175,000, depending. We will be working together to get Mexicali 3.0 off the ground!

column1: The perks that I am offering to our generous supports are, but not limited to, Gift Cards, a chance to sign the wall in the bar, a never released Mexicali hat, a plaque with your name and/or picture, 15% discount for life and the secret recipes to our most coveted menu and drink items!

Mexicali has been a part of the Williston community for over 20 years and has been an active member of that community. Generations of families have come through the doors, people have meet, dated and become engaged at Mexicali. Mexicali is woven into the fabric of the community and I would like it to be so for years to come with your help.

Restaurants are a risky business, but I believe with the support of our loving network of friends, regulars, family and 1000s of satisfied guests from all over the state and country that we will be successful! Even if you can’t contribute, please share this campaign with all your friends and family either by word of mouth, on social media or using the Indiegogo share tools so that my plea can reach as many people as possible. Please help me to continue this local tradition.
Thank you,
Stew Corey

","My name is Stew Corey and I have owned Mexicali since May of 2016. Before that I was a manager at The Windjammer for 6 years. My experience in restaurants goes back to when I was a dishwasher at the Birdseye Diner in Castleton, Vermont when I was 16, almost 20 years ago. It was while I was working at The Windjammer that I meet the Charboneaus and fell in love with Mexicali. From the first time I walked through the doors I knew it was a special place. I could tell by the smiles on the faces of the guests and the staff that it was great place and I instantly wanted to take part. My family and I made the decision to purchase Mexicali and on May 4th, 2016 I took ownership, the day before Cinco de Mayo! Since then I have only fell more in love with Mexicali and the people of the community. I have made mistakes and learned a lot over the course of the last year and unfortunately my last mistake lead to a very severe lesson, one that I will never forget. I am humbly asking our community and friends to help me keep this tradition alive not for my family, but for the charity work that is still to be done, the good food still to serve, the shorties still to be drunk and the hot ranch still to dip. Please help me to prove that sometimes the little guy does win!
Your donations will be used for two phases of the plan to move forward: Phase 1 is to wrap up Mexicali 2.0 and Phase 2 is seed capital for Mexicali 3.0.
Phase 1 will be to close out all the accounts payable that are left including, but not limited to the following:
-paying off outstanding balances to vendors
-paying the balance of the utility bills
-paying the outstanding taxes
-paying off creditors
-paying the legal fees incurred during the eviction process

I won’t know the the exact amount that Phase 1 will cost until I receive a bill for the legal fees and any other fees my previous landlord is going to charge me, but my best estimate is $75,000-$100,000. Hopefully it will be less, but time will tell.
Phase 2 is the exciting part! During Phase 2 your donations will fund the following:
-putting a down payment on a new space
-buying refurbished equipment to kit out the new kitchen
-new signage, computer system, office supplies and other small items
-stocking the kitchen and the bar with all of your favorites
-getting new licenses and insurance
-renovations as needed to the new space
-any other costs of restarting Mexicali
Phase 2 is going to be funded by your donations and an investment of my own and my family’s funds. You might be asking why I have to buy equipment and a computer system
column2: that is because they were sold to cover a part of the money owed to a creditor. So the balance of the donations will go towards this phase of the plan, between $150,000-$175,000, depending. We will be working together to get Mexicali 3.0 off the ground!

column1: The perks that I am offering to our generous supports are, but not limited to, Gift Cards, a chance to sign the wall in the bar, a never released Mexicali hat, a plaque with your name and/or picture, 15% discount for life and the secret recipes to our most coveted menu and drink items!

Mexicali has been a part of the Williston community for over 20 years and has been an active member of that community. Generations of families have come through the doors, people have meet, dated and become engaged at Mexicali. Mexicali is woven into the fabric of the community and I would like it to be so for years to come with your help.

Restaurants are a risky business, but I believe with the support of our loving network of friends, regulars, family and 1000s of satisfied guests from all over the state and country that we will be successful! Even if you can’t contribute, please share this campaign with all your friends and family either by word of mouth, on social media or using the Indiegogo share tools so that my plea can reach as many people as possible. Please help me to continue this local tradition.
Thank you,
Stew Corey",0.0,0,"1 Campaign

column1: What Makes WOKY Bottles Special?
The unique selling proposition is WOKY's one-piece ceramic design.  The screw-thread and inners are all-ceramic, meaning drinkers don't have to worry about the harm of adhesives.

This means drinks stay pure. No metal taste added to liquids inside the bottle or the opening because it's all ceramic. Whilst the patented design means it's easy to clean.  This double wall, vacuum insulated bottle will help keep beverages cold and hot for 6+ hours.
Soaking your previous smelly bottle in hot water or soda, is a temporary solution to a permanent problem!
We're offering a professionally crafted bottle, with multiple useful features.  Our latest WOKY Bottle range is exclusive to pre-order on Indiegogo, available in a series of unique colors.

column1: Let's Talk About Why Some Drinks Taste of Metal
The bottle's material you choose will have an impact on your drinks flavor. It can also be a potential breeding ground for bacteria, staining, rust and contain foul smells.
Generally, there are four main bottle options to choose from:
<ul>
<li>
Plastic - Over time, plastic stains whilst absorbing odors and flavors
<li>
Stainless Steel  - Sometimes imparts off flavors and doesn’t work with citric liquids
<li>
Glass - Sometimes contains lead and usually cannot withstand high temperatures
<li>
Ceramic - It is neutral and neither absorbs nor imparts flavors and it's great to retain heat
Ceramics are fired to temperatures in the thousands of degrees. By doing so, this helps to ensure the porcelain will not absorb any moisture, flavor, odor or stains.
Comparison chart of WOKY versus other bottle types
Our Ceramic Bottles are Eco-friendly
As of 2017, a million plastic bottles were bought across the globe each minute, with many of these destined for landfill or the ocean rather than the recycling centre.
How eco-friendly is ceramic?  Derived directly from the Earth, ceramic is also one of the most natural materials you can use. It is more benign to the environment than, say, plastic.
The WOKY ""One-Piece"" Bottle Structure Explained

Other ceramic bottles on the market, still contain metal. This is usually located on the screw-thread (a metal cap that screws onto threads through the neck of a bottle and is fixed with adhesives). With a patented design, WOKY is the ultimate ceramic bottle.
<ul>
• WOKY contains an all-ceramic lined structure with no adhesive harm
• Other ceramic bottles still contain metal or metal tastes and grows bacteria
Features Breakdown and Specifications
Detailed specifications and materials
<ul>
• Cup lid inner core, capacity and weight: Ceramic, 500ml and 500g weight
• Sealing washer and Slip Mat: Food grade silicone
• Cup body liner: Mouth integrally formed with a true porcelain liner
• Cup body shell: Double vacuum insulation 304 stainless steel
• Dimensions: Cup diameter 6cm x bottom diameter 7cm x height 22cm
<h2>Anatomy of a Better Bottle &amp
WOKY can easily fit in a tote, messenger, or a backpack and can fit in most cupholders.
In terms of function, long-lasting freshness is guaranteed and the contents are held securely in place. Hot liquids stay warm for 6 hours. Cold liquids stay chilled for 6 hours.
Stronger - Scratch and everyday wear resistant
WOKY is different from the normal baking bottle body used by most thermos bottles on the market.  We use powder coating technology which has passed 13 rigorous process tests.
On the subject of testing, our 50kg gravity drop tests show there was no major damage. Knocks, normal height drops and bumps will not break the bottle.
We have added a food grade silicone ring on the edge and on the lid, to enhance protection.
We provide a limited warranty against manufacturer defects and will replace any eligible product found to be defective within the scope of normal/appropriate use.
Secure and prevents leakage - Keeping the contents safe
The lid is inbuilt into the top of the screw-top cap and opens and closes quickly to prevent leakage.  The silicon case holder protects the bottle from breaking and is soft.
By using the handle to close the lid, it helps tighten the lid further thus prevent leaking. WOKY is 100% leak-proof, sealing the bottle cap with a silicone rubber ring.
Clean -  Now more than ever, keeping your bottle squeaky clean is so important

The inner ring of the WOKY ceramic thermos cup uses the same food grade silicone glue as baby pacifiers.  This makes the bottle heat resistant to 120 degrees and can be directly thrown into hot water for disinfection.
It's dishwasher safe too.  All areas of the WOKY bottle can easily be reached with the WOKY bottle cleaning brush, included with every reward.
<ul>
• Hand-wash after each use. Scrub with a soft sponge to keep the surface smooth.
• Rinse the bottle immediately with hot water. For heavy stains, soak for 6+ hours.
• The ring inside the bottle can be washed, dried and inserted back into the cup.
Solving Problems for our Target Audience
Compared with most bottles and thermos' on the market, WOKY can handle water with lemon, tea, hot coffee, protein shakes, energy drinks, hot chocolate, soda to soup.
Tea drinkers

Tea can contain a large amount of tannic acid, theophylline, aromatic oil and multivitamins. For example, a thermos cannot regulate temperatures, so tea can taste bitter, vitamins are destroyed and overall reduces the nutritional value.
Brew your hot or iced tea at home or on the go, and WOKY will keep its ideal temperature.

column2: >Keeps tea securely in the bottle without drips or staining

column1: Coffee drinkers
The bottle is 'Barista Approved', vacuum insulated to keep drinks warm and features effective cushioning and shock absorption...just in case you spill your drinks.
Say goodbye to coffee stains!  WOKY holds 500m of liquid, enough to get your 'Grande' fix.

column2: >WOKY can manage hot coffee without changing the taste or smell

column1: Store clean water to travelling on-the-go
Whether you're commuting, hiking or at the gym, a reusable bottle is a handy way of ensuring you get enough liquids throughout the day while not wasting any plastic.
Designed to fit standard bicycle water bottle cages and in-car cup holders, WOKY is a perfect everyday tumbler.

column2: >Fits snugly inside your car, holdall or backpack

Indiegogo InDemand Timeline
About WOKY
For over two decades, WOKY has been using its hardware processing knowledge and thermal engineering passion to create sophisticated products that improve quality of life.
Fit for purpose design
Your WOKY is made to last. We carefully consider purpose, materials and end of life when creating our products.  We create products that are fit for purpose
column2: to reduce and replace the use of disposable cups and drink containers.

column1: WOKY is exclusive to Indiegogo and Kickstarter

It's the first time WOKY has been officially promoted outside of Taiwan and this bottle on InDemand is the newest product made by WOKY.  It is the only WOKY bottle that comes with pressure-resistant handle, which helps you to close and open the lid easier, making it very secure.
Partnerships and Collaborations
Unseen Select Co.'s mission is to ""Let the Unseen Be Seen"".

Unseen  Select Co. is founded in Taiwan. We feel sad seeing quality MIT (Made In Taiwan) products are missing from being recognized internationally.  Therefore, we have decided to help these companies step out of their comfort zone.  At Unseen Select, we are dedicated to sharing quality MIT products across the globe.
Customer care and Warranties
We are committed to quality, which is evident in each design in our collection. We hope you enjoy using our products just as much as we enjoyed creating them for you!
The customer will have 12 months warranty for the product, but if they receive any damaged products, we will either replace the damaged part or send the customer a replacement.
SGS Certification

The exporter arranges SGS professional locally to inspect export goods, SGS satisfies the quality as per buyer's requirements and certifies. Once after completion of a satisfied inspection by meeting all required specification as per buyer's requirements, the SGS issues a certificate of inspection.
Factory Information

WOKY has more than 20 years of hardware foundry experience. At the beginning, it mainly produced pots and pans and other kitchen utensils. Until the past ten years, it began to develop its own products. The ceramic liner adopts Jingdezhen high white porcelain grade and stainless steel evacuation factory.
All products are produced under certified equipment, in a safe factory environment  that supports social responsibilities.
Each BPA Free thermal bottle in our collection is born at the hands of skilled Taiwanese craftsmen, inspired by aesthetical beauty and driven by unprecedented quality that lasts.

column3: '>If your idea of a perfect pairing is a fantastic craft beer and the soothing and familiar sound of classic hip hop, soul, funk, or jazz, then BierWax is the destination for you. We seek to support local breweries, finely curate tastes and sounds, and build and strengthen both physical communities and communities of interest in the process. We will offer roughly twelve taps of great beer, an array of ciders and wine, and more than 5,000 records spanning many genres. We have invested more than $100K in bringing this vision to life and have secured a wonderful space blocks from Barclays Center in Prospect Heights, Brooklyn. Because we intend to build a community around BierWax, we are asking the community to play a part in finalizing the space. We want you to be as passionate about and invested in the success of BierWax as we are. Your contributions will help us in our final push to build the ideal venue to provide you the best possible experience.

column1: An amazing venue is more than four walls, a bar top, and some tap lines. Your contributions will go toward executing the build out and design of BierWax, further expressing our vision and sensibilities through decor and ambiance. We were lucky enough to find a space that was already a restaurant/bar, but we need to modify the space to meet our needs.  We are seeking $30,000 to close the gap in our fundraising and fully build out BierWax the way we have envisioned it. Your contributions will directly help the installation of the following key components of our space: record shelving, draught system, updated furniture, DJ booth, mixer and speakers.
What you will get

The most important reward from contributing to BierWax will be the establishment of an authentic venue to enjoy a wide-array of incredible beer and classic records, which will hopefully become your favorite place to frequent after work, a Saturday afternoon, or on a date night. But, everybody likes gifts, so we have plenty of those to offer as well. See the Perks Section for additional details.
A few of our perks:
The BierWax Team

Over the past year, we have grown to include some dynamic individuals who are part of the BierWax family as founding partners. We would not have been able to make this dream a reality without these folks and other people not pictured. (We are equally excited for you to play a role in our opening and be a critical part of this journey via Indiegogo.)
The other team...
Other Ways You Can Help
We hope you can contribute to our campaign, but there are other ways to help out if you can't.
<ul>
• Spread the word about our campaign to your friends, family, and social media connections. You can easily share our campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools.
• Sign up for our newsletter via our website to keep up with BierWax news. www.bierwax.com
• Swing by BierWax once we are open.
Fulfillment Phase:
Now that we have reached our goal thanks to our 367 backers, we are focused on shipping out perks.  Perk fulfillment is officially underway. Look out for a package soon!

An amazing venue is more than four walls, a bar top, and some tap lines. Your contributions will go toward executing the build out and design of BierWax, further expressing our vision and sensibilities through decor and ambiance. We were lucky enough to find a space that was already a restaurant/bar, but we need to modify the space to meet our needs.  We are seeking $30,000 to close the gap in our fundraising and fully build out BierWax the way we have envisioned it. Your contributions will directly help the installation of the following key components of our space: record shelving, draught system, updated furniture, DJ booth, mixer and speakers.
What you will get

The most important reward from contributing to BierWax will be the establishment of an authentic venue to enjoy a wide-array of incredible beer and classic records, which will hopefully become your favorite place to frequent after work, a Saturday afternoon, or on a date night. But, everybody likes gifts, so we have plenty of those to offer as well. See the Perks Section for additional details.
A few of our perks:
The BierWax Team

Over the past year, we have grown to include some dynamic individuals who are part of the BierWax family as founding partners. We would not have been able to make this dream a reality without these folks and other people not pictured. (We are equally excited for you to play a role in our opening and be a critical part of this journey via Indiegogo.)
The other team...
Other Ways You Can Help
We hope you can contribute to our campaign, but there are other ways to help out if you can't.
Spread the word about our campaign to your friends, family, and social media connections. You can easily share our campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools.
Sign up for our newsletter via our website to keep up with BierWax news. www.bierwax.com
Swing by BierWax once we are open.
Fulfillment Phase:
Now that we have reached our goal thanks to our 367 backers, we are focused on shipping out perks.  Perk fulfillment is officially underway. Look out for a package soon!",5.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Brooklyn, United States",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/finely-curated-beer-sounds-help-build-bierwax/pica

Abbott &
column2: Wallace Distilling aka Longtucky Spirits is a whiskey and rum distillery in Longmont, Colorado. We are also the only distillery in Colorado canning ultra premium cocktails from hyper-local ingredients. Longtucky features a large tasting room that hosts local musicians, comedians and artists every week. We are set to harvest our bourbon barrels for our 3rd anniversary in June. All of our grains are sourced from a farm 5 miles from the distillery, and every bag of barley is malted 15 miles away at Root Shoot Malting. Abbott &amp
column3: Wallace Distilling is poised for success with the growth of our canned cocktail program and release of our Bourbon and Rye Whiskies this summer.

column1: However, like many businesses, we have been devastated by the restrictions of COVID-19. The community has been very supportive of Longtucky Spirits throughout the pandemic with shopping local and purchasing our bottles of spirits. But, bottle sales cannot replace the vibrant atmosphere of our tasting room and the delicious cocktails that generate most of our revenue.

Proceeds from this fundraiser will allow us to pay employees, keep the landlord happy, maintain our professional relationships and purchase the materials necessary to release our Bourbon and Rye this summer. With a little help we can survive this pandemic and be prepared for the future.

Find out more and purchase spirits at Longtuckyspirits.com

column2: >Now available for purchase on www.vacanti.com
column5:
> 

Wine, like life, is meant to be enjoyed. We started Vacanti Wine Glasses to enhance your appreciation of the beautiful subtleties of wine. With our premium, hand-crafted Spirale design, you are able to enjoy your wine like never before. Its patented spiral at the bottom of the glass captures the sediment in wine, which reveals its richness while ensuring a smoother finish. Savor and enjoy every last sip.
column7:
>

Select your favorite wine, uncork and pour into your Spirale glass.
column9:
>

Enjoy your wine as sediment settles into the hand-blown Spirale design. That’s it!
column10:
>

Appreciate the unique properties of your wine, enjoy the smooth texture, and savor every sip without the worry of bitter sediment.
column12: ref=nav_search"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">
column13:
>

During testing, we sent over 600 glasses to people for testing and feedback. Here are just a few that love Spirale glasses!
column17:
>

Wine glasses today are built to hold wine, but they’re not built to enhance your experience of the wine. That’s why we designed our patented corkscrew system. As sediment settles to the bottom of the bowl, the spiral in the stem separates the sediment from the wine. This hand-blown feature keeps the sediment at bay, even down to the last drop.
column19:
>

The last thing you want is to have your glass of wine ruined by sediment. With Spirale, enjoy your favorite wine without the concern of sediment. Trap the sediment and eliminate the possibility of a horrible, bitter taste.
column21:
>

Part of the experience of enjoying wine is the presentation. Our elegant, hand-blown design is the perfect fusion of form and function. Enjoy a glass of wine on the porch after a long day, or set your table with Spirale glasses for an elegant dinner party - they’re sure to look beautiful anywhere!
column23:
>

Don’t think your wine has sediment? Some bottles of wine may surprise you. With Spirale wine glasses, there is no need to plan ahead to separate sediment from your wine through decanting or filtering. Be spontaneous! Simply open, pour and enjoy. Our glasses have you covered.
column25:
>

 An added bonus? Spirale may be unique, but the clean up isn’t. Not only can these glasses be easily hand washed, but Spirale glasses are dishwasher safe too!
column33:
>

We sent over 600 sample glasses to retailers, wine experts, wineries, restaurants, and target consumers all around the world to gather their input to perfect our design. We’ve had hundreds of experts use and clean Spirale to great success. Here’s what they say...

column1: Margaux Reaume, Sommelier and Founder at Argaux &
column2: Arden Montgomery, Sommelier and Founder at Argaux

column1: <div>
Rachel Ego, General Manager at The Club at Rolling Hills

column6: >
column8: ref=nav_search"" rel=""noopener nofollow"" target=""_blank"">
column10:
>

We're Margarita and Patrick Vacanti, wine lovers on a mission to enhance the experience of wine. We don't want to strain or filter. We just want to pour and enjoy.

The idea for Spirale originated with a bottle of delicious red wine. We enjoyed every sip until the last one was tainted by a bitter flow of sediment. Inspired by how the shape of a corkscrew grips a cork, we embedded a spiral at the bottom of our glass to ""grip"" the sediment. After five years of industry testing and consumer feedback, Spirale is ready for the world to enjoy.
column12: >
column14:
'/>

We can’t thank you enough for checking out our project and helping us make the Spirale Wine Glass a success.

We know not everyone will be able to support us with a pledge. You can still be a supporter of the Spirale Wine Glass by helping us spread the word on Twitter, Facebook, Reddit, Instagram and anywhere else you can think of!

","Now available for purchase on www.vacanti.com   Wine, like life, is meant to be enjoyed. We started Vacanti Wine Glasses to enhance your appreciation of the beautiful subtleties of wine. With our premium, hand-crafted Spirale design, you are able to enjoy your wine like never before. Its patented spiral at the bottom of the glass captures the sediment in wine, which reveals its richness while ensuring a smoother finish. Savor and enjoy every last sip. Select your favorite wine, uncork and pour into your Spirale glass.  Enjoy your wine as sediment settles into the hand-blown Spirale design. That’s it! Appreciate the unique properties of your wine, enjoy the smooth texture, and savor every sip without the worry of bitter sediment.  During testing, we sent over 600 glasses to people for testing and feedback. Here are just a few that love Spirale glasses!     Wine glasses today are built to hold wine, but they’re not built to enhance your experience of the wine. That’s why we designed our patented corkscrew system. As sediment settles to the bottom of the bowl, the spiral in the stem separates the sediment from the wine. This hand-blown feature keeps the sediment at bay, even down to the last drop. The last thing you want is to have your glass of wine ruined by sediment. With Spirale, enjoy your favorite wine without the concern of sediment. Trap the sediment and eliminate the possibility of a horrible, bitter taste. Part of the experience of enjoying wine is the presentation. Our elegant, hand-blown design is the perfect fusion of form and function. Enjoy a glass of wine on the porch after a long day, or set your table with Spirale glasses for an elegant dinner party - they’re sure to look beautiful anywhere! Don’t think your wine has sediment? Some bottles of wine may surprise you. With Spirale wine glasses, there is no need to plan ahead to separate sediment from your wine through decanting or filtering. Be spontaneous! Simply open, pour and enjoy. Our glasses have you covered.  An added bonus? Spirale may be unique, but the clean up isn’t. Not only can these glasses be easily hand washed, but Spirale glasses are dishwasher safe too!          We sent over 600 sample glasses to retailers, wine experts, wineries, restaurants, and target consumers all around the world to gather their input to perfect our design. We’ve had hundreds of experts use and clean Spirale to great success. Here’s what they say...

In May of 2016, Carnal Chocolates was birthed. I leveraged my 20 year experience in branding and graphic design to create a truly memorable packing experience. I brought on board my business partner, Gin, former bakery owner and financial business professional. Together we share a passion to bring nourishment consciousness back to the public through chocolate and caramel that will leave you speechless. We use organic and sustainable ingredients - caring about where every single ingredient comes from and how that impacts the planet. It is amazing to really take in that for a year and half we have been able to successfully provide the public with unforgettable artisanal chocolates and caramels.

Carnal is a small-batch truffle and caramel company dedicated to sustainable, organic ingredients. All of our chocolates are made with 70% fair-trade, organic, dark chocolate. Small batches are hand stirred, hand cut and hand dipped. We make classic flavors like peppermint ganache and toasted coconut in butter caramel. And we add some flair with Pining for My Honey…a layer of caramel with roasted pinenuts, honey and some lavender. Or Snap My Ginger, a brown sugar caramel infused with organic ginger and enrobed in dark chocolate. Those are only a few of our flavors. When it comes to caramel - we go all out! No corn syrup. In fact no preservatives period. Our food is fresh, organic, thoughtfully sourced and filled with the energy of love.

As our clientele has grown, we have reached the capacity of what we can produce without equipment. This equipment would let us grow our offerings and cut our production time in half.

We are looking to raise $3000.

For what you say? First, a chocolate tempering machine (ChocoVision Revolation V Chocolate Tempering Machine, 9 lb. Capacity $1588 - $1700).

What is tempering and why do I care? Okay, quick science lesson. Ever open a chocolate bar and it had grey spots? It doesn’t mean it’s bad, it’s just “bloomed”.

""Tempering chocolate is an essential step for making smooth, glossy, evenly colored coating for dipped chocolates. Tempering prevents the dull grayish color and waxy texture that happens when the cocoa fat separates out. Tempered chocolate produces a crisp, satisfying snap when you bite into it. The objective in tempering melted chocolate is to entice the disparate fatty acid crystals of cocoa butter back into one stable form through heating and cooling periods.""

This handy  machine does just that…so instead of hand stirring for hours and guarding the heat fluctuations, we can just focus on making more scrumptious truffles!

The second piece of equipment is an attachment piece to the magical tempering machine. (Chocolate Dispensing Attachment $650 - $780).

This piece allows the tempered chocolate to pour, like a fountain, and flow back into the tempering bowl. Why is this such a luxury? Currently we are only able to enrobe two truffles or caramels at at time (enrobing is the process of coating that silky ganache with a hard chocolate coating so you don’t have to get your hands messy). Yep you read that correctly, two. This handy spout will allow us to enrobe close to 20 at a time. Can you imagine the time saved? It would also allow one of us to go through the entire chocolate making production instead of both of us. Making our time that much more efficient. Which is why we are so excited about this campaign.

If we are graced with more funds than expected, we wish to grow our inventory of caramel pots. We currently have one. These 12 qt stock pots are expensive for a small growing chocolate company
column2:
between $75 and $200 for a thick bottom, even heat distribution, stainless steel vessel that helps us make the magical caramel so many of you have proclaimed the best caramel you’ve ever tasted. The addition of three more pots would allow us to make more batches at once!

These three items will be a game changer for us.

If this is not for you, no problem! Share our message if you can, with people you think would be interested in our endeavor. Or just send us some good juju!

You exercise, you do your best to eat well, but chances are you're still missing out on some of the best nutrients nature has in store.
<div><div class=""campaignStoryVideoWrapper""><iframe src=""https://www.youtube.com/embed/H69FHPX6o04?rel=0&amp

Turmeric is super trendy, its anti-inflammatory benefits and health promoting history legend, but how often do you add it to your food? You've probably heard that spices are fantastic, concentrated antioxidant powerhouses, but do you get enough of them? And then there's this sleeper superfood, it's in every health store, nutritionists swear by it, but let's be honest, it looks like sawdust, and its name -- nutritional yeast -- doesn't whet the appetite. 

Here's the magic: I've combined all the very best nutrients, balanced them so that turmeric tastes delicious - not a hint of the medicinal or bitter notes -- and added the nutritional yeast so you can enjoy all the health benefits and the incredible added flavor. It's also formulated to maximize the absorption and activity of turmeric.

Ayala’s Magic Spice transforms food with a delicious and nutritious boost. It naturally enriches dishes with deeper umami, savory and complex flavors while making them more nutritionally complete – practically making every food into a superfood.

For health, environmental and ethical reasons, a growing number of people are shifting toward a more plant-centered diet. For decades, we've been encouraged to Eat More Plants, yet plant-powered dishes tend to require more time and expertise in the kitchen. Ayala's Magic Spice gives you, the cook, a simple, practical way to enrich your dishes with a healthy and natural flavor -- and reap your guests' compliments at the same time.

If you're on a mostly plant diet -- vegan or vegetarian -- Ayala's Magic Spice will supply you with specific nutrients of value: B12, whole protein and iron, that's besides the vitamins, antioxidants and fiber.

Ayala's Magic Spice artfully blends high quality, freshly ground, antioxidant-rich spices and a strangely neglected super healthy ingredient -- nutrition experts and vegan chefs often urge us to add it to your diet, yet chances are you don't. 

The final spice mixture is tasty, attractive, nourishing, convenient and functions as a flavor and a nutrition boost. It can be added as an ingredient in cooking, or sprinkled as a finishing spice on prepared food.

It's vegan, salt and gluten free, and also free of all the major allergens. From the nutritional point of view, it's a great source of B vitamins (B12, thiamine, riboflavin, niacin, pyridoxine), iron, vitamin A, antioxidants, other vitamins and trace elements, and it contains complete protein.
column5:
showinfo=0"">

After months of making Ayala's Magic Spice in my kitchen, lots of research, sourcing, testing, and feedback from friends, chefs and cooks, I'm finally ready to bring this amazing spice mix to your home. 

A successful crowdfunding campaign will persuade retailers to make room on their shelves for better, healthier products. Our food system needs to change, we need better products, and we need to make cooking, especially plant-based cooking, easier. 

By showing support for this healthy product and flavor revolution you’ll help me convince food makers and supermarkets that delicious doesn’t have to rely on sugar, fat and salt.

All proceeds from this InDemand will be used directly on the operations of Ayala’s Magic Spice and on fulfilling your orders.

Back Ayala's Magic Spice and become part of our story. Once the campaign is over, I will be in touch to collect your shipping address details. I will then keep you updated throughout the process, and you will become one of the first people to enjoy using Ayala's Magic Spice in the fall of 2017. 

cooking healthy home-made meals should easy and fun

MISSION STATEMENT

As a physician and food entrepreneur I've constantly been looking for simple ways to promote wellbeing through healthy food. At the same time I strongly believe that tasty and healthy have to go hand in hand. 

My spice mix brings to you some of the most potent ingredients -- which health experts again and again recommend you use every day -- in a perfectly balanced artisan blend.

WE ARE SOCIAL

Visit our website, sign up for
column6:
id=3a8eee3154"" rel=""noopener nofollow"">Dr. Ayala's newsletter, be part of our Facebook community

A super-duper huge THANK YOU for taking the time to read this and for all of your support! I’ve come this far feeling the love from my friends, family, and community. 

Risks and challenges

There are very few risks as everything with the project is planned and ready to go. I have founded a food startup before, so I know what it takes.

In order to ensure on time delivery, I will need to receive proper mailing information.

In the event that things don't go exactly as planned, whether it's a delay in the manufacturing or shipping, I promise to communicate honestly with you and to work around the clock until it's corrected.

Risks and challenges are inherent in the creation of a new product
column7:
bringing healthy, convenient and great-tasting concepts to reality is my passion, and I thank you for your trust and support.

column3: a healthy bridge snack to keep your energy flowing and a moment to savour!

column1: With your help, I can start producing my super yummy wholefood collagen bars and to help remind you to make #TimeFor yourself!
My goal is to raise $10,000 so that I can bring TimeFor to life!
The funds would be used as follows:
Initial bulk ordering of raw ingredients
inimum production runs for packaging
Commercial equipment items needed to start production
Thank you for your time and support :)",0.0,0,"1 Campaign
|","Edmonton, Canada",https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/timefor-collagen-wholefood-bars/pica

The Cheesecake Spot

My name is Laurie I am a Wife, a Mother, and a  Pastry Chef. From a very young age, I have had a passion for baking.  While attending culinary school I developed a love for creating Gourmet Cheesecakes. These delectable desserts have satisfied the sweet tooth of my family, friends and local customers alike. We are now ""The Cheesecake Spot"" and these delicious Gourmet cheesecakes are already being sold in markets.   Now is the time to make the ""The Cheesecake Spot"" a household name! We have been given an opportunity to bring these treats to the masses.

• To raise $7000.00
